comment: Yeah. Luckily I've seen some in that category lean to positive peer pressure. Also as more and more get it and we see positive effects, that'll help at least in some places.We really need to fix the whole problem with not everyone having a shared set of facts/reality though.

comment: Yeah. I still know far too many people who are too nervous to get the vaccine. Theyre not anti-maskers, anti-vaxxers, or think this is all a hoax meant to take away their freedom either. That worries me that Im seeing so much reluctance.
